subject: America's Cup
Boats and Boating
lead_paragraph: The brothers Loïck and Bruno Peyron said their Energy Team would challenge for the 34th America’s Cup, which will be sailed on San Francisco Bay in 2013.
snippet: The brothers Loïck and Bruno Peyron said their Energy Team would challenge for the 34th America’s Cup, which will be sailed on San Francisco Bay in 2013.
